name: God of Thunder
description: After an embarrassing display by his younger self, the present day Q is considering doing away with the emotion of love altogether! Can happy grooms and brides convince him that love is part of the meaning of life?
rules:
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Faction Missions in one phase, and Supply Missions in another phase.
-- Unique Faction Missions and Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Yates, D. Troi, Worf, Scoundrels or Lothario Q will provide a bonus to Faction Missions and Supply Missions.
-- Every Faction or Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 2 only. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Yates, D. Troi, Worf, Scoundrels, or Lothario Q
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Soren
featured_crew.flavor: A member of the androgynous J’naii species who later reveals she identifies as female—is joined by Riker on a rescue mission.

featured_crew.name: Yates
featured_crew.flavor: Against the wish of the prophets, Kasidy marries Benjamin Sisko.

rewards.flavor: Security Chief for the U.S.S. Enterprise-D, he was the first Klingon to graduate from Starfleet Academy.

adventures.description: Research individuals trying to atone for hurting a partner.

rewards.name: God of Thunder
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

goals.flavor: Prove love isn't an encumbrance in the Federation.

rewards.name: Yates
rewards.flavor: Against the wish of the prophets, Kasidy marries Benjamin Sisko.

action.name: Well, That Almost Sounds Like A Threat

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

next_threshold_rewards.name: Chronitons
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "Your argument is flawed, Q. I didn't find true fulfilment or meaning in my life until I found the person I was meant to share it with."
"And speaking as someone who married a godlike being, I can tell you it didn't affect his willingness to do what the universe needed him to do one jot."

responses.text: "But that's what life is. Many small moments that create a larger whole."
"Don't you have a son and a mate yourself?"
"You'll never understand the importance of pizza, Q. It's beyond you."

screens.text: "And what problems of galactic import have you and your husbands solved, ladies? The identity of the next Bajoran kai? The best way to deal with stress? The perfect pizza toppings?"
"For you, perhaps. And only because you don't know any better."
"Terms I used for your benefit, because mortals could never understand how the Continuum actually works."
"I'm sorry you trotted out the old wedding gowns to no avail, but my mind's made up. 'Tis better to never have loved at all, says I."

"The petaQ has no heart. We must appeal to his brain--or what passes for one. We must prove to him that love has not prevented mortals from resolving many important problems over the course of galactic history."
"Your argument is flawed, Q. I didn't find true fulfilment or meaning in my life until I found the person I was meant to share it with."
